Description: Base sherd of Chian pottery open vessel, possibly a mug with trace of wall, and slightly raised centre to floor; white slip; interior glazed streaky brown (partly fired red); exterior reserved; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1924) (phase 2)
Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 67)
